column1: Your HealthTap account has been deactivated. We are sorry to see you go and would love to hear more about your reasons for leaving so that we can better serve our members. If you have a moment, please respond to this email and share your feedback.
column2: 我们很遗憾您离开了但是希望知道您离开的理由以便我们能更好地服务我们的会员。如果您有时间，请回复这封邮件分享您的反馈。

column1: Thank you.
